title: Fair Oaks Farms, LLC Recalls Pork Sausage Patties Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 22, 2017 Fair Oaks Farms, LLC, a Pleasant Prairie, Wis. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,134 pounds of pork sausage patties that may be adulterated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The fully cooked...
impacted_products: 2-lb. plastic sleeve packages containing “BREAKFAST Best FULLY COOKED ORIGINAL PORK SAUSAGE PATTIES,” with a sell-by date of 05/15/2018.
